skill.name: Training Dummy
skill.desc: Use on a champion to spawn a movable target dummy nearby. Cannot be used in combat.

skill.name: World Ender
skill.desc:
Transform for a few seconds, converting all bonus Attack Speed to Attack Damage. While transformed, attacks deal physical damage in an area.

Darkin Blade: Gain 350 Health and Omnivamp. If another unit holds this weapon for at least 5 seconds, Aatrox will revive upon their death.

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt

skill.name: Essence Theft
skill.desc:
Steal essence from enemies around her target, dealing magic damage and 20% Mana Reaving them.

Every 3 casts, instead, unleash a wave that deals magic damage to all enemies hit. This deals 33% more damage to enemies whose essence has been stolen.

lonia Bonus: +3 Mana per second

Mana Reave: Increase max Mana until the next cast

skill.name: Moonlight Vigil
skill.desc:
Fire a moon blast at the largest group of enemies that deals physical damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

For 7 seconds, equip 3 Chakram, plus 1 more for each enemy hit by the blast. Attacks deal bonus physical damage for each Chakram equipped. Aphelios heals for 75% of damage dealt by Chakrams.

skill.name: Volley
skill.desc:
Fire 8 arrows in a cone, each dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and Chilling them for a few seconds.

Chill: Reduced Attack Speed by 30%

skill.name: Arise!
skill.desc:
Passive: After every third attack from Azir, a Sand Soldier deals 105 magic damage to their target.

Active: Summon a Sand Soldier to attack your target. It Azir already has 3 Soldiers, they all immediately deal magic damage instead.
stats: Max Soldier Strike: 70% of Soldier Damage

skill.name: Corrosive Acid
skill.desc:
Passive: Cast every 2 attacks and cycle between 3 different Abilities.
Active: Lob there pools of acid towards the largest group of enemies, dealing magic damage and 60% Shredding and Sundering enemies for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Royal Malestrom
skill.desc: Lash out at the lowest Health enemy in range 6 times. Each lash deals physical damage and 2% of the target's max Health as true damage.
stats: Total Number of Lashes: 6 + 5 per 100% bonus AS

skill.name: Twin Fang
skill.desc:
Deal magic damage to the current target and Wound them for 5 seconds. If they are already Wounded, deal bonus magic damage.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%

skill.name: Feast
skill.desc: Deal magic damage to the lowest adjacent Health enemy. If this kills them, devour them and permanetly gain max Health.

skill.name: Noxian Guillotine
skill.desc: Deal physical damage to the current target. If they die, immediately cast this again with damage.

skill.name: Phase Dive
skill.desc: Heal 20% of damage taken in the last 4 seconds and deal magic damage to the current target.

skill.name: Blade Waltz
skill.desc:
Become untargetable and strike the current target 4 times. Each strike deals physical damage and true damage. Heal for 15% of the total damage dealt.

If the target dies, change targets to the nearest enemy.

skill.name: Shield of Durand
skill.desc: Reduce damage taken and heal for over 4 seconds. After, deal magic damage to adjacent enemies.

skill.name: The Dreadway
skill.desc:
Cutlass Passive: Gain 50 Armor and Magic Resist. Attacks ignite the target, dealing true damage over 2 seconds.Pistol Passive: Gain 3 range. Attacks grant 5 extra mana.

Active: Summon the Dreadway to sail across the board, crashing into the first enemy hit and dealing magic damage in a 3-hex radius. Allies the Dreadway passes through or hits with the crash are empowered by citrus, gaining Attack Speed and immunity to crowd control for 3 seconds.

skill.name: Smoke Grenade
skill.desc:
Launch a smoke grenade toward the current target. It explodes on impact dealing physical damage to adjacent enemies, leaving behind a smoke cloud that Chills for a few seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%

skill.name: CH-3X Lightning Grenade
skill.desc: Hurl a grenade towards the largest group of enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies in a large area and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: H-28G Laser Beam
skill.desc: Heimerdinger's turret fires a laser beam in its target's direction, dealing to all enemies it passes through.

skill.name: Harsh Lesson
skill.desc: Deal magic damage to the current target, linking souls for 5 seconds. While linked, heal % of all damage taken by the target.

skill.name: Defiant Dance
skill.desc:
Enter a defensive stance and gain Shield that rapidly decays over 3 seconds. When it breaks, deal magic damage + 30% of the damage absorbed to enemies around and in front of Irelia.

Ionia Bonus: +25 Armor and Magic Resist

skill.name: Cataclysm
skill.desc: Leap on a nearby enemy. Deal magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes and Stun them for 1.75 seconds.

skill.name: Acceleration Blast
skill.desc: Grant Attack Speed to Jayce and to the allies on his left and right for 3 seconds. Fire a blast at the current target that explodes on the first enemy hit. It deals physical damage to enemies near the blast.

skill.name: Curtain Call
skill.desc:
Take aim at the current target and deal physical damage to enemies in a line; each hit reduces damage by 40%.

Ionia Bonus: +25% Attack Damage

skill.name: Fishbones!
skill.desc: Fire 5 rockets at random enemies within 2 hexes of the current target. Each rocket deals physical damage.

skill.name: Icathian Rain
skill.desc: Dash away from all enemies, then fire missiles split across the 4 nearest enemies. Each missile deal magic damage.

skill.name: Inner Flame
skill.desc:
Fire a burst of energy at that explodes upon impact, dealing magic damage to adjacent enemies. Every third cast launches 3 burst.

Ionia Bonus: +25% Ability Power

skill.name: Force Pulse
skill.desc:
Gain Shield for 4 seconds. Deal magic damage to enemies in a cone and Disarm them for a while.

Disarm: Cannot move or attack, but CAN cast spells

skill.name: Voracity
skill.desc:
Throw three daggers that land next to enemies within two hexes. Then, teleport to each to deal magic damage to adjacent enemies and Wound them for 6 seconds.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%

skill.name: Divine Ascent
skill.desc:
Passive: Kayle gains new Passive effects as your Tactician levels up.
Level 1: Attacks deal bonus magic damage.
Level 6: Every 3rd attack launches a wave that deals magic damage and Shreds enemies for 3 seconds.
Level 9: Every attack launches a wave and they travel farther.

skill.name: All Out Strike
skill.desc:
Heal for max Health. Knock up the current target before smashing them to the edge of the battlefield. Deal magic damage and Stun them for few seconds. Deal magic damage to enemies the target collides with and Stun them for few second.

If the target can't be pushed back any further, knock them off the battlefield. Otherwise, K'Sante will chase after them.

skill.name: Call of the Void
skill.desc: Open two portals near the current target. Destroy 50% of shields and deal magic damage to all enemies caught between the portals.

skill.name: Ultra Mega Fire Kick!!!
skill.desc: Kick a ball at the current target that deals magic damage and Stuns for 1.5 seconds. The ball bounces to the closest enemy behind the target, dealing magic damage on impact and magic damage to adjacent enemies.

skill.name: X Marks the Spot
skill.desc: Call down an X-shaped rain of bullets, destroying 35% of your target's shields and dealing magic damage. For 5 seconds, enemies hit have incoming shields reduced by 35%.

skill.name: God of Death
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal bonus magic damage, increased while God of Death is active.

Active: Gain Shield and 1 range for 5 seconds. Killing enemies in this state steals their Health, Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resistance until combat ends.

skill.name: Eviscerate
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain 15% Omnivamp.
Active: Deal physical Damage.

Darkin Dagger: After casting, summon packmates that attack the first enemy hit for a total of AD.

skill.name: Soul Eater
skill.desc:
Steal max Health, Attack Damage, and Defenses from the nearest enemies for 8 seconds.

While empowered, every third attack deals physical damage.

skill.name: Riptide
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain 30% bonus Armor and Magic Resistance from all sources.

Active: Deals magic damage to enemies within two hexes. Knock them up and pull them together, Stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: Pop Blossom
skill.desc: Leap towards the current target and gain Shield for 3 seconds. Slam down after a brief delay, dealing magic damage to enemies within two hexes.

skill.name: Formless Blade
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks strike in a cone, dealing physical damage to up to 2 additional enemies. Every 3rd attack strikes in a line for physical damage and grants 25% Attack Speed.

Active: Gain Shield for 3 seconds and dash to a safe location.

skill.name: Command: Protect
skill.desc: Grant the lowest Health ally Shield for 4 seconds and empowers Orianna's next attack to deal bonus magic damage.

skill.name: Steadfast Hammer
skill.desc: Gain Shield for 4 seconds. Deal magic damage to the current target.

skill.name: Supreme Display of Talent
skill.desc: Dash to strike enemies in a line and deal physical damage, Stunning and knocking up the first target hit for 1.5 seconds and all other targets for 0.5 seconds.

skill.name: Skystrike
skill.desc: Launch Valor through the row or column with the most enemies, marking them to take 10% (Ability power) increased damage for 4 seconds. Then rain down arrows, dealing (Attack damage) physical damage split between all marked enemies.

skill.name: Furious Bite
skill.desc:
Deal physical damage to the current target and mark them. If they are below 66% Health, this damage is converted to true damage. If the target is marked, deal bonus true damage

If this kills the target, rip through them 1 hex and heal Health.

skill.name: Cull the Meek
skill.desc: Deal magic damage to adjacent enemies. Heal for the first enemy hit and another for each additional one.

skill.name: Void Charge
skill.desc: Rift Herald charges at the furthest enemy and crashes into the first enemy hit. The crash deals magic damage and stuns for  seconds all nearby enemies.

skill.name: Realm Warp
skill.desc:
Wanderers' spells change depending on the Region Portal players voted for at the start of the game.

Bandle City
Create a portal to Bandle City under a Most expensive unit on your bench. They are summoned to the battlefield with bonus Mana and are...slightly smaller? If there are no units left on your bench, Ryze summons a high tier unit instead.

Demacia
Create a portal to Demacia that protects allies for 2 seconds. Allies within the zone gain Shield. If an ally leaves the safety of the portal, they are healed for 250. When the portal expires, enemies within are dealt magic damage.

Freljord
Create a portal to the Freljord under a random group of enemies for 2 seconds. The freezing winds deal magic damage to enemies within two hexes over the duration and apply Permafrost, a permanent Chill. If enemies are already affected by Permafrost, they are instead Stunned for the duration.
Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%

Ionia
Create a portal to Ionia in the center of the battlefield, summoning forth a Spirit Tree that affects the closest units. Allies gain Attack Speed for 6 seconds and are healed for over the duration. Enemies dance, dealing magic damage and Stunning them for 2 seconds.

Noxus
Create a portal to Noxus that spews out a torrent of weapons and armor, granting completed items to random allies with open slots, and throwing axes towards random enemies that deal magic damage each. If an ally would recieve an item while all slots are full, they instead gain a stacking 10% damage increase for the rest of combat.

Piltover
Create a portal to Piltover that launches an enforcer grenade towards the largest clump of enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies within two hexes and creating a containment area for few seconds. Enemies are unable to leave the area, and 15% of the damage dealt to them is also dealt to all other enemies within.

Shadow Isles
Mark the Lowest Health % ally's soul(s) to be reclaimed by the Shadow Isles. After they die, they return to the battlefield with of their maximum Health. If all living allies are already marked, Ryze instead resurrects a deceased ally. Ryze cannot resurrect himself.

Shurima
Create a portal to Shurima, summoning a roaming sand tornado that deals magic damage to enemies hit and knocks them up, Stunning them for few second. The tornado has a chance to unearth buried treasures and gold as it travels.

Targon
Create a portal to the skies above Mount Targon that beckons the current target. After a few seconds, they descend from the heavens as a meteor towards the largest group of enemies, dealing of the initial target's maximum Health as magic damage. Enemies in the epicenter are briefly knocked up. If the target is the only enemy remaining, they never descend.

Zaun
Create portals to Zaun, causing hired guns to fire at nearby enemies. Deals magic damage and Wounds, 20% Shreds, and 20% Sunders for 6 seconds. The more gold you have, the more powerful the portals become.
25 Gold: +1 portal. Portals fire a rocket that deals 50% damage in a one-hex radius.
50 Gold: Double the portals. Summon 1 additional portals for every 20 Gold more.

skill.name: Realm Warp: Bandle City
skill.desc:
Create a portal to Bandle City under a Most expensive unit on your bench. They are summoned to the battlefield with bonus Mana and are...slightly smaller?

If there are no units left on your bench, Ryze summons a high tier unit instead.

skill.name: Realm Warp: Bilgewater
skill.desc:
Create a portal to Bilgewater, summoning a giant treasure chest to fall on the largest cluster of enemies that deals magic damage. The size of this chest is increased by 1% for every 2 gold you have.

Each enemy hit has a chance to knock gold or other treasures out of the chest, and that chance doubles if the chest kills the enemy.

skill.name: Realm Warp: Demacia
skill.desc:
Create a portal to Demacia that protects allies for 2 seconds. Allies within the zone gain Shield. If an ally leaves the safety of the portal, they are healed for 250.

When the portal expires, enemies within are dealt magic damage.

skill.name: Realm Warp: Freljord
skill.desc:
Create a portal to the Freljord under a random group of enemies for 2 seconds. The freezing winds deal magic damage to enemies within two hexes over the duration and apply Permafrost, a permanent Chill.

If enemies are already affected by Permafrost, they are instead Stunned for the duration
Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%

skill.name: Realm Warp: Ionia
skill.desc: Create a portal to Ionia in the center of the battlefield, summoning forth a Spirit Tree that affects the closest units. Allies gain Attack Speed for 6 seconds and are healed for over the duration. Enemies dance, dealing magic damage and Stunning them for 2 seconds.

skill.name: Realm Warp: Ixtal
skill.desc:
Create a portal to Ixtal, coating the ground around the current target in a thicket of vines. After a brief delay, deal magic damage to enemies within and Stun enemies at the epicenter for few seconds with a knockup.

Allies within are wrapped in Barkskin, granting Armor and Magic Resistance for a few seconds.

skill.name: Realm Warp: Noxus
skill.desc:
Create a portal to Noxus that spews out a torrent of weapons and armor, granting completed items to random allies with open slots, and throwing axes towards random enemies that deal magic damage each.

If an ally would recieve an item while all slots are full, they instead gain a stacking 10% damage increase for the rest of combat.

skill.name: Realm Warp: Piltover
skill.desc: Create a portal to Piltover that launches an enforcer grenade towards the largest clump of enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies within two hexes and creating a containment area for few seconds. Enemies are unable to leave the area, and 15% of the damage dealt to them is also dealt to all other enemies within.

skill.name: Realm Warp: Shadow Isles
skill.desc:
Mark the Lowest Health % ally's soul(s) to be reclaimed by the Shadow Isles. After they die, they return to the battlefield with of their maximum Health.

If all living allies are already marked, Ryze instead resurrects a deceased ally. Ryze cannot resurrect himself.

skill.name: Realm Warp: Shurima
skill.desc:
Create a portal to Shurima, summoning a roaming sand tornado that deals magic damage to enemies hit and knocks them up, Stunning them for few second.

The tornado has a chance to unearth buried treasures and gold as it travels.

skill.name: Realm Warp: Targon
skill.desc:
Create a portal to the skies above Mount Targon that beckons the current target. After a few seconds, they descend from the heavens as a meteor towards the largest group of enemies, dealing of the initial target's maximum Health as magic damage. Enemies in the epicenter are briefly knocked up.

If the target is the only enemy remaining, they never descend.

skill.name: Realm Warp: Zaun
skill.desc:
Create portals to Zaun, causing hired guns to fire at nearby enemies. Deals magic damage and Wounds, 20% Shreds, and 20% Sunders for 6 seconds. The more gold you have, the more powerful the portals become.

25 Gold: +1 portal. Portals fire a rocket that deals 50% damage in a one-hex radius.
50 Gold: Double the portals. Summon 1 additional portals for every 20 Gold more.

skill.name: Flair
skill.desc: Shoot at the current target and deal to the first enemy hit. Reduce their Armor by 10 for the rest of combat.

skill.name: Fury of the North
skill.desc:
Passive: Whenever an ally attacks a Chilled enemy, they deal bonus true damage.

Active: Gain Shield for 4 seconds. Deal magic damage to nearby enemies and Chill them for 4 seconds.

Chill: Reduced Attack Speed by 30%

skill.name: Facebreaker
skill.desc:
Pull in an enemy on either side and slam them together, dealing magic damage and Stunning them.

If only one enemy is grabbed, the damage and Stun duration are increased by 50%.

Ionia Bonus: +200 max Health

skill.name: Ki Barrier
skill.desc:
Gain Shield and grant Shield to the 2 lowest Health allies for 4 seconds. After shielding his allies, Shen's shield refreshes with a burst, dealing magic damage to adjacent enemies.

Ionia Bonus: +8% Damage Reduction

skill.name: Undercity Tactics
skill.desc: Throw a vial the closest surrounded enemy, covering nearby hexes chemicals for a few seconds. Deal magic damage per second to chemical-affected enemies, and heal affected allies. When possible, target unaffected groups.

skill.name: Glory in Death
skill.desc:
Passive: Upon death, reanimate with 100% Health, decaying at max Health per second. Sion can no longer use his abilityo, but is immune to Crowd Control and gains Attack Speed.

Active: Charge towards the most enemies within charge range. Deal to any enemies along the way and Stun them.

skill.name: Crescendo
skill.desc: Send a wave of sound at the largest clump of enemies and deal magic damage to enemies hit. Allies hit by the wave gain Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

skill.name: Astral Infusion
skill.desc:
Heal the lowest health ally. If the ally is below 50% Health, increase the amount healed by 33%.

The ally is infused for 5 seconds, calling down 5 stars over the duration that deal magic damage to the closest enemy.

skill.name: Demonflare
skill.desc:
Transform and gain max Health. While transformed, deal magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes every second.

If already transformed, gain an additional max Health and deal magic damage to enemies within.

skill.name: Seismic Shove
skill.desc:
Passive: Whenever an enemy is knocked up by anything, throw a boulder at them, which deals magic damage.

Active: Knock up the current target for 2 seconds.

skill.name: Radiance
skill.desc: Gain Shield for 4 seconds. It redirects 50% of the damage received bby adjacent allies.

skill.name: Powering Up
skill.desc:
T-Hex is still powering up and has no Ablity. Once she reaches 20 Power, gain hextech Breath.

Hextech Breath: Breathe flames in a cone, dealing magic damage in all enemies hit.

skill.name: Stacked Deck
skill.desc: Throw a hand of cards at the current target, dealing damage and encircling them. After 1.5 seconds the cards explode, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

skill.name: Plasma Fission
skill.desc: Fire a plasma bolt towards the current target that deals to the first enemy hit. It then splits in two, dealing 50% less damage whenever it passes through an enemy.

skill.name: Blast Shield
skill.desc:
Gain Shield for 4 seconds. Deal physical damage to enemies within 1 hex of the current target and Sunder them for 4 seconds.

Sunder: Reduced Armor by 40%

skill.name: Void Shield
skill.desc: Void Remora curls into a defensive position for 2 seconds, gaining shield. When the shield expires, it explodes, dealing to all nearby enemies.

skill.name: Primal Howl
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks heal for 30.

Active: Gain 100% bonus Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. Then, Stun adjacent enemies for 1.25 seconds.

skill.name: Featherstrike
skill.desc:
Summon feathers that converge on the current target, dealing physical damage each. Each feather removes 6 Armor from the first target they hit until the end of combat.

Ionia Bonus: Attacks restore an additional 5 Mana
